member.name: T:BundleTransformer.JsMin.Minifiers.CrockfordJsMinifier
member.summary: Minifier, which produces minifiction of JS code by using C# port of Douglas Crockford's JSMin

member.name: M:BundleTransformer.JsMin.Minifiers.CrockfordJsMinifier.Minify(BundleTransformer.Core.Assets.IAsset)
member.summary: Produces a code minifiction of JS asset by using C# port of Douglas Crockford's JSMin
member.returns: JS asset with minified text content

member.name: M:BundleTransformer.JsMin.Minifiers.CrockfordJsMinifier.Minify(System.Collections.Generic.IList{BundleTransformer.Core.Assets.IAsset})
member.summary: Produces a code minifiction of JS assets by using C# port of Douglas Crockford's JSMin
member.returns: Set of JS assets with minified text content
